Glossary
========

.. glossary::

  CLI
    Command Line Interface

  NWL
    Nano Workflow Language

  NWL CLI
    Command line program ``partis-nwl``

  NWL Tool
    An interface to an underlying program using :term:`NWL`

  YAML
    https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/

  JSON
    https://www.json.org/json-en.html

  Cheetah
    Cheetah3, the Python-Powered Template Engine: https://cheetahtemplate.org/

  Python
    Programming language: https://docs.python.org
